physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Intensely itchy and coalescing papules and plaques overlying lichenified plaques observed on the labia majora.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initially presented as dark spots in the labia majora that evolved into thickened plaques with increased itching before consultation. After treatment, lesions became hyperpigmented macules without itching showing clinical improvement over 4 weeks. No recurrence after 3 years of follow-up.
